page.title: 07WORTHEN-PUBLIC BUS SERVICE
page.content:
The bus service in WORTHEN is run by{ {Shrewsbury Coach Travel. }It was until recently Valley Motor Services,and before that Worthen Motorways.There is a garage depot in Worthen, and the company has three buses.The service varies from day to day and you can travel to {Shrewsbury, Montgomery,}and {Welshpool}from Worthen as follows:-
To Shrewsbury-Mon,Tues,Wed,Fri.4 buses Thurs. 3 buses Saturday 6 buses To Welshpool Monday only 1 bus To Montgomery Monday 5 buses Tue,Wed,Thur,Fri.4 buses
There are no other public transport services.
